attributes.action: It is time for Dominic Cummings to be removed from Westminster and Whitehall.
attributes.background:
Dominic Cummings was not elected by the electorate. His views are not on public record or available for scrutiny.

He should not have the influence he has on our prime minister, the cabinet or civil service. 

He should be removed. Permanently.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a Special Adviser to lose their job.
